channel.title: Tennis on Tristan Berchoux
channel.description: Recent content in Tennis on Tristan Berchoux

item.title: Selling the Power of Statistics
item.description: A few weeks ago we learned that Warren Buffett is a big IBM fanÂ (a $10 billion fan, that is). Having heard that I went over to the IBM web site to see what they’re doing these days. For starters, they’re not selling computers anymore! At least not the kind that I would use. One of the big things they do now is “Business Analytics and Optimization” (i.e. statistics), which is one of the reasons they bought SPSS and then later Algorithmics.
